title: Front setback (marginal distance) as prescribed under highway or any other rules shall be applicable if they are over and above as prescribed in these regulations
clause_text: Front setback (marginal distance) as prescribed under highway or any other rules shall be applicable if they are over and above as prescribed in these regulations.
section: Other buildings like Public / Semi-Public, Educational, Medical, Institutional, Commercial, Mercantile, etc.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Front setback (marginal distance) as prescribed under highway or any other rules shall be applicable if they are over and above as prescribed in these regulations.
